comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Charles William de la Poer Beresford, 1st Baron Beresford GCB GCVO (10 February 1846 – 6 September 1919), styled Lord Charles Beresford between 1859 and 1916, was a British admiral and Member of Parliament." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lord_Charles_Beresford

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: B-59, thanks for locating the Baron's full name. We'll update our catalog record.
